storagetypes: XQD and Type I CompactFlash memory cards (UDMA compliant)
microphone: Built-in monaural or external stereo microphone
continuousshooting: Up to 10 fps (CL) or 10 to 11 fps (CH)
videoformats: • 1,920 × 1,080; 30p (progressive), 25p, 24p • 1,920 × 1,080 crop; 30p, 25p, 24p • 1,280 × 720; 60p, 50p, 30p, 25p • 640 × 424; 30p, 25p Actual frame rates for 60p, 50p, 30p, 25p, and 24p are 59.94, 50, 29.97, 25, and 23.976 fps respectively; all options support both high and normal image quality
numberoffocuspoints: Can be selected from 51 or 11 focus points
